description: Execute Parallel.ai Tasks in Parallel for extremely powerful data enrichment from the web

capabilities.name: createMultitask
capabilities.description: Creates a new task group for batch processing. Responds with a URL in format https://task-mcp.parallel.ai/{taskGroupId} that can immediately be shared with the user for viewing, results will be streamed in here.

capabilities.name: getTaskGroupResultsMarkdown
capabilities.description: Get Task Group Results as Markdown
